answers.answer: My son was induced at 37 weeks for preeclampsia but he was 6lbs and 19in, very healthy baby, not so healthy momma. I know it's upsetting, my pree was not so mild i was very sick and it was for the best. I am currently 35 weeks and my bp started spiking a few weeks ago so we will see..

I had my baby on the 17th by C section. She was a month early, 6.6lbs 19in long. I went into labor but she was breech so we had to do a cesarean. She and I are perfectly healthy and doing fine. Congrats to you! Woo hoooooo we did it mama!
39 weeks tomorrow and no sign of baby yet :(

I was induced on Monday... didn't work. They try something else on Tuesday morning and I had my baby boy at 39 weeks on Wednesday morning after 22h of contractions... took the epidural after 16h and 5 cm dilated. I was in shape to push and it took less than a half hour! minor tearing and a happy baby boy of 8.8lbs, 21 inches!

question: Was induced last Thursday at 37 weeks exactly. I was diagnosed with mild preeclampsia. Baby girl was born 4 lbs 14 oz. 17.5 in. She's so tiny and it upsets me so much they forced labor. :( hope this doesn't happen to any of you! She's perfectly healthy though fortunately. Picking up weight pretty fast too.
title: Anybody else had theirs yet?
